description:
Protect yourself, reducing damage and also gaining
some stall points.
name: Guard

description:
Give 10 MP to your teammate. 
It also costs 10 SP to use.
name: Mana Share
note:
Enemies won't be able to use this spell.
<Cooldown: 1>

description:
Create Crossed Stairs, dealing massive damage to the
enemy twice. It is a very useful skill.
name: Cross Stairs

description:
Warp stairs on an ally to use as a shield to reduce the
damage of incoming attacks.
name: Warp Stairs

description:
Move stairs down onto an enemy, doing damage and
causing them to get stuck in stairs sometimes.
name: Move Stairs Down

description:
Create a drawbridge, lowering all enemy's EVA, SDP, and
Hit rate.
name: Drawbridge

description:
Call a drone to do extrodinary damage to 1 enemy 
give it debuffs.
name: Call Drone

description:
A simple strong attack. One of Chameleon's special
skills.
name: Strong Attack

description:
Buffs a party member's HP, MP, ATK, DEF, MAG, INT, SPD,
and LCK.
name: Full Buff

description:
Add a regeneration effect to all of your team members,
giving them HP, MP, and SP every turn.
name: Regen Field

description:
Protect yourself, reducing damage and also gaining
some stall points.
name: Guard
note:
Same as defend, except it's a spell instead.
Used for Dirk and Rank.

description: Create stairs to hit the enemy and deal damage to them.
name: Create Stairs

description:
Create a healing field to heal an ally. It will heal
about 70% of a party member's HP.
name: Healing Field

description:
Gift 20 MP to your teammate, for only 10 MP 
There is no SP cost!
name: Mana Gift
note: Enemies won't be able to use this spell.

description:
Create a portal to cure an ally with the Fallen state,
and fully heal them.
name: Create Portal

description:
Protect your allies from incoming hits and take less
damage for a few turns.
name: Protect Allies

description:
Create a link for an ally, increasing their speed and
evasiveness massively for 1 turn, and attack slightly.
name: Create Link

description: Get blessed with mana, giving you about 20 mana.
name: Mana Blessing

description:
Patron's Ultimate. It will heal fully heal everyone's
HP and restore half mana.
name: Patron Ultimate

description:
Destroy some stairs, and throw the segments of the
stairs at the enemy for pure attack damage.
name: Destroy Stairs

description: Deal magic damage by damaging the enemy directly.
name: Damage Enemy

description: Apply an attack buff to the entire team with magic.
name: Buff Attack

description:
Create a wall on a teammate to protect them from
incoming attacks from enemies.
name: Create Wall

description:
Hit the enemy with your fullest potential, dealing
randomly high or low damage. Also costs some HP.
name: Power Hit

description:
Bend multiple stairs downwards into all enemies, 
dealing some damage to them and piercing defense.
name: Bend Stairs

description:
Quickly buff your own attack, and give yourself an
extra turn for next turn.
name: Quick Buff

description:
Create a damaging field around yourself and smash into
the enemy. You lose almost all of your HP.
name: Wicked Ultimate

description:
Create a dance field over the enemies, causing them to
have a chance to start dancing.
name: Dance Field

description:
Create invisible stairs on a teammate to mostly protect
them from a hit or 2. Speeds up SP regen while active.
name: Invisible Stairs

description:
Attempt to trick an enemy into a platform trap, causing
them to become fallen instantly, but rarely.
name: Platform Trap

description:
Create fake stairs on an ally, causing any enemies to
attack them to be counter attacked.
name: Fake Stairs

description:
Create immortality for a teammate which lasts 2 turns.
Has a 20% chance of doing the opposite, though.
name: Immortality Trick

description:
Flip stairs into an enemy, damaging them based on your
luck stat.
name: Flip Stairs

description:
Raise all ally's magic and attack stat, but lower their
defense and intellegence stat.
name: Unbalance Stats

description:
Raise all ally's defense and intellegence stat, but 
lower their attack and magic stat.
name: Unbalance Stats (Defense)

description:
Joker's ultimate pranks all the enemies, causing them
to fall 90% of the time.
name: Joker Ultimate

description:
Build phantom stairs on the enemy, dealing damage based
on your magic stat.
name: Phantom Stairs

description:
Teleport around, raising your evasion rate by half
for 3 turns.
name: Teleport

description:
Ghostify an enemy, making them unable to move, and you
unable to hit them for a few turns.
name: Ghostify Enemy

description:
Create some mana for yourself, with a chance of getting
more or less than the spell cost.
name: Create Mana

description:
Search around the area quickly to find mana for
yourself.
name: Find Mana

description:
Unghostify some stairs on an enemy, dealing damage to
the enemy based on you max mana and current mana.
name: Unghostify Stairs

description: Fully heal yourself. Goes first.
name: Heal Self

description:
Cast phantom stairs everywhere, bringing all of the
enemies down to 1 HP.
name: Spectre Ultimate

description:
Move stairs forwards, hitting an enemy with them for
some damage.
name: Move Stairs Forwards

description:
Cures any and all status effects off of an ally, no
matter if they're good or bad. Also heals slightly.
name: Cure Ally

description:
Cures any and all status effects off of an enemy, no
matter if they're bad or good.
name: Cure Enemy

description:
Move stairs sideways, hitting all enemies to deal
damage.
name: Move Stairs Sideways

description:
Protect all of your allies from any bad or good
status effects for a few turns.
name: Status Protection

description:
Create a shield on a target, greatly increasing defense
and target rate, but preventing them from moving.
name: Fortify Shield

description:
Remove all of the applied buffs on all of the enemies.
Also deals some damage to all of them.
name: Remove Enemy Buffs

description:
Remove all status effects and debuffs from the entire
team, and give them the quick status and some buffs.
name: Keeper Ultimate

description:
Steal Stairs, and then use them with the "Use Stairs"
spell that unlocks when you have stairs.
name: Steal Stairs

description:
Use the stairs you recieved from the "Steal Stairs"
spell, doing massive damage against all enemies.
name: Use Stairs

description: Steal HP from the enemy, and recieve it as your own.
name: HP Steal

description:
Steal some MP from the enemy, and use it as your
own.
name: MP Steal

description:
Create a bypass for the team, raising their speed and
their critical hit rate. You need stairs to use this.
name: Create Bypass

description:
Recieve some stashed mana hidden inside your bag, when
you're really desparate for some.
name: Stashed Mana

description:
Ditch Stairs onto an enemy, dealing some damage to 
them. This skill requires stairs to use.
name: Ditch Stairs

description:
Store your stairs into your iventory to use later. 
You can only store 1 stair at once.
name: Store Stairs

description:
The user steals half of the enemy's HP for them self,
and steals the enemy's stats, giving themself a buff.
name: Thief Ultimate

description:
Glitch an enemy, causing it to attack anyone for the
next few turns. This attack also does minimal damage.
name: Glitch Enemy

description:
Exploit an enemy's weakness, dealing magic damage to
them.
name: Exploit

description: Swap the entire team's HP/50 by MP*50.
name: Swap

description:
Dash around and strike random enemies while you do for
some damage.
name: Dash

description: Raise the critical rate of all allies by 30%.
name: Critical Up

description:
Blink around the enemy and perform an unexpected attack
for a strong physical hit with no variance.
name: Blink

description:
Hack all ally's stats, increasing their maximum HP and
MP by 50% for a while. Also heals HP a bit.
name: Hack HP and MP

description:
Discover a huge bug in the code, doubling all of your
allies' stats for a long time.
name: Hacker Ultimate

description:
Create a split on an enemy, defeating it instantly.
You will not recieve climb points from the enemy.
name: Create Split

description:
Enter a random split and attack an enemy as you exit.
This attack will restore your SP slightly, too.
name: Random Split

description:
Create split stairs to damage the enemy, which will
lower their speed and sometimes defeat them.
name: Split Stairs

description:
Restores a party member's SP by 30, and also has a 
chance to also double the amount of SP they gain.
name: SP Restore

description:
Increase the amount of climb points all allies recieve,
but gives them debuffs.
name: EXP Up

description:
Create a split for all allies that will reflect 
incoming magic type attacks back at the enemy.
name: Reflect Split

description:
Create a split for a teammate, removing them from 
battle for a turn, but restoring 50% of their stats.
name: Emergency Split

description:
Create splits everywhere, instantly defeating enemies
and rewarding climb points!
name: Archon Ultimate

description:
Create cursed stairs on an enemy, doing a magic attack
determined by your attack stat.
name: Create Cursed Stairs

description:
Curse an enemy, making it take damage for a few turns
after that. This attack also does damage.
name: Curse Enemy

description:
Create a downward schism on all enemies, causing them 
to miss more often. Also deals damage in the process.
name: Downward Schism

description:
Create a upwards schism on all allies, increasing 
evasion and speed. Also deals minimal damage.
name: Upward Schism

description:
Curse the team, fully draining their SP to restore
their MP. Also has a slim chance you apply Curse.
name: Curse Trade Off

description: Lower all the enemy's defenses greatly.
name: Lower Defense

description:
Revive a fallen party member by playing around with
your curse and uncurse powers.
name: Force Revival

description:
Deals a lot of damage to all enemies, reduces their
defense, and curses them. Sometimes possesses.
name: Heretic Ultimate

description:
The drifter will create drifts everywhere, dealing
damage to all enemies and leaving some debuffs.
name: Drifter Ultimate

description: Create a drift to deal damage to random enemies.
name: Create Drift

description:
Spin an enemy, making them only use their normal 
attack. Also restores SP in the process.
name: Spin Enemy

description:
Drift a stair into an enemy, dealing damage to them.
Scales slightly with speed.
name: Drift Stair

description:
Create a lift for a teammate, increasing their speed, 
critical rate, and evasivness indefinitely.
name: Create Lift

description:
Attacks the enemy based on your speed. The higher your
speed is, the stronger it is.
name: Speed Strike

description:
Buffs your own speed, and gives you the quick status
effect as well.
name: Speed Buff

description:
Create an inside drift on all of the enemies, which
slowly defeat them. It will also do an activation hit.
name: Inside Drift

description:
Give 10 MP to your teammate. 
It also costs 10 SP to use.
name: Mana Share
note:
Enemies won't be able to use this spell.
<Cooldown: 1>

description:
Attack the enemy with a stronger attack that will go
through their defense, and attack quickly.
name: Piercing Attack

description:
Set up a counter for a turn, blocking some damage and
attacking back. Enemies are more likely to target you.
name: Counter

description:
The user will restore most of someone's MP, by
sharing their secret mana storage.
name: Mana Battery

description:
The user will share multitokens, restoring
everyone's SP by 50.
name: Share Multitokens

description:
Dirk breathes fire on all the enemies, and causes them 
to go up in flames.
name: Fire Breath

description:
Dirk creates a magical electric projectile that will
home in on an enemy. This pieces enemy defense.
name: Electric Burst

description:
Dirk sends a magical projectile at the enemy, dealing
damage and changing their genes with his genetics magic.
name: Air Swipe

description:
Dirk slams his horns into an enemy, dealing huge damage
and causing himself to also take damage too.
message1: slams his horns into the enemy!
name: Horn Strike

description:
Create cursed stairs as a shield for one ally to mostly
protect them from magic attacks.
name: Curse Stairs

description:
Overpowered as heck. No wonder it's so rare for
dragons. Works on the entire party.
name: Healing Magic

description:
Andrew sprays water onto all enemies, lowering their
SPD, EVA, and HIT. Costs some HP to use.
name: Water Magic

description:
Andrew creates a magical electric projectile similar to
Dirk's version.
name: Electric Magic

description:
Andrew creates a shield for every party member,
increasing their defense. It may break after an attack.
name: Defensive Magic

description:
Give 10 MP to your teammate. 
It also costs 10 SP to use.
name: Mana Share
note:
Thief's mana share. Set to "spells" instead
of "skills."

Use the stairs you recieved from the "Steal Stairs"

Ditch Stairs onto an enemy, dealing some damage to

description:
The user and their ghost both build stairs, dealing
damage to an enemy twice.
name: Build Dual Stairs

description:
The user copies their ghost, making them intangable to
all physical attacks for a few turns.
name: Copy Ghost

description:
Create a revival point, bringing a fallen ally back.
They will only have 1 HP, though.
name: Create Revival Point

description:
Fully fuse with your ghost, causing you to lose your
spells but become intangable for a while.
name: Ghost Union

description:
Restore your HP and MP by 75%. Can only be used once
per battle.
name: Regenerate Self

description:
Sync your ghost with your team members, restoring
your party's mana by 25% and boosting MAG & INT.
name: Sync Ghost

description:
Create a soul bridge for all of your teammates which
raises their evasiveness and lowers their MP costs.
name: Create Soul Bridge

name: Flicker

Zap uses their tail to charge themself, reducing their
